features: Improved Design: Our new improved black toothbrush pack is designed to eliminate 99% of plaque with total convenience. Get the best for your oral health with the new Dental Expert Charcoal toothbrush that has angled bristles to sweep away all the plaque.
Power Tip Long and Soft Bristles: The long, soft, and effective bristles of our charcoal toothbrush are comfortable to use and it is a reliable product to use with regular or charcoal toothpaste.

𝐈𝐌𝐏𝐑𝐎𝐕𝐄 𝐆𝐔𝐌 𝐇𝐄𝐀𝐋𝐓𝐇, 𝐑𝐄𝐃𝐔𝐂𝐄 𝐆𝐈𝐍𝐆𝐈𝐕𝐈𝐓𝐈𝐒, 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐑𝐄𝐒𝐓𝐎𝐑𝐄 𝐎𝐏𝐓𝐈𝐌𝐀𝐋 𝐃𝐄𝐍𝐓𝐀𝐋 𝐇𝐘𝐆𝐈𝐄𝐍𝐄 𝐈𝐍 𝐉𝐔𝐒𝐓 𝐅𝐎𝐔𝐑 𝐖𝐄𝐄𝐊𝐒 – do you have bad gum health, gingivitis or other poor dental health problems? Dental Experts new toothbrush is designed to easily access and properly clean all parts of your mouth (including tongue and upper mouth) so you can boost your overall dental hygiene in four weeks. This new toothbrush is an excellent everyday accessory

Improve Gum Health: Our Oral B charcoal toothbrush is best to improve gum health, reduce gingivitis and restore optimal dental hygiene in just four weeks because it to design to easily access and properly clean all the parts of the mouth.
Premium Offer: Get maximum value with our super pack of 5 top quality Dental Expert black toothbrushes that you can use for up to 15 months at a bargain price or get 1 pack for the entire family.

Money-Back Guarantee: Don’t forget to add these ultra-soft charcoal toothbrushes to your cart for your whole family. If for any reason you’re not happy with our product, we will make it right and process a refund for you. Get your pack risk-free today with our premium money-back guarantee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dental Expert charcoal toothbrush provide many of the same benefits as charcoal toothpaste. Activated charcoal properties built into the bristles easily absorb plaque and bacteria to help remove stains, whiten teeth, and reduce bad breath. This pack comes with 5 whitening toothbrushes that can be used by both adults and kids. Because each toothbrush has a distinct color, you can designate a toothbrush for each member of your family. Give your dental health an instant boost with premium quality toothbrushes that have a practical slim handle and high-efficiency ultra-soft bristles.

SOFT BRISTLES Each charcoal toothbrush in this dental expert pack has ultra-fine charcoal bristles that are highly effective with sensitive teeth and inflamed gums. Put your oral health first and leave nothing to chance. COMPREHENSIVE CLEANING Dental Expert charcoal toothbrushes are a comprehensive oral cleaner - designed to whiten teeth, remove food debris, coffee, smoke and wine stains from your teeth. PRACTICAL HANDLE Our toothbrushes come with practical slim and comfy handles that make it easy for you to brush every side of your teeth with ease. They are also lightweight and compact for travel convenience. VALUE PACK This is a value pack of premium quality charcoal toothbrushes. Each toothbrush cleans teeth and gums very effectively to brighten your smile and restore your oral health. Get more value for money.

Premium quality gentle toothbrushes Dental Expert products are designed by a panel of top dentists, and highly tested to make sure that they effectively get rid of dental stains, odors, and plaque. This toothbrush pack has been made to fix some of the shortcomings of conventional store-available toothbrush. Long soft bristles – which are ideal for sensitive teeth and inflamed gums – access hard to reach areas of the mouth to thoroughly clean out odor-causing germs. This is the toothbrush pack that will have a profound impact on your dental health. Comprehensive cleaning action for your entire mouth Dental Expert 5-pack toothbrush provides comprehensive cleaning action for your teeth, cheeks, tongue, upper mouth, and all other areas. This way, you can reliably conquer plaque, bad-odor, stains, and other common dental problems that people face on an everyday basis. Even better, you can use this toothbrush with your regular toothpaste, or our activated charcoal toothpaste. Safety warning • Not intended for use by small children. • Replace your toothbrush every 3 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent purchase. 😁
reviews.reviewText: Can't beat it for the price. Seems to be a quality build. Small brush head is great. Can comfortably get to the very back of your teeth and gums. Can't speak much for whitening capabilities as I have only begun using them with charcoal activated paste. They come 5 per package so should hold up for quite a while depending on one's brushing style. The only con I have is the ultra softness of the bristles. I prefer very stiff bristles but I'm getting used to them. A much different feeling that is actually making me brush longer which is a good thing. Great colors and I like the black bristles. The bristles are black in color only and not charcoal activated in any way. I've used these with both my Caliwhite charcoal paste and regular Colgate gel. Works well with anything. So far I am pleased and would recommend and order again. WWGOWGA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No noticeable whitening after a week
reviews.reviewText: I have been using these toothbrushes for a week. I like the way the bristles feel on my gums, and they seem to clean well. I brush 4 times a day, and have not noticed any whitening yet. Maybe I need t get the charcoal activated toothpaste?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality with good price!!
reviews.reviewText: It's a great product for customers who want to use a soft toothbrush because they have weak gums. The design is excellent and the price is very reasonable.Above all, the quality of the brush is good, so it can be used for a long time without changing the shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I think it slowing my gum loss around my teeth.
reviews.reviewText: 5 Pack Colorful Charcoal Toothbrush.. I have some gum loss because I brush too hard and my dentist complains to me. I tried to lighten up but my teeth didn't feel clean. I took a chance on these and I love them. It kida forces me to brush lighter because they are soft bristles and here are a lot more in the brush. My teeth just feel cleaner than the old brushes. Ill never go back to those plastic bristles again. Can you imagine what that plastic crap is doing to your enamel. My wife has sensitive teeth and she loves this brush too. Anyway the whole CHARCOAL thing they mention in the description irrelevant, if that's turning you off about these brushes its simply means nothing. Simply your teeth, gums, and mouth just feels cleaner after brushing with this brush.. God bless, God speed, and good luck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too soft, way too soft.
reviews.reviewText: More for a baby. Way too soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023

reviews.reviewText: These are ok, they're very very soft bristles. Too soft for my personal preference it.
Very soft and good size for small mouths. It's easy to put away in a travel size bag, no complaints.
